title: Slings (skill)
data:
{{obsolete}}
''For the sling that now uses the [[Ranged Weapons]] skill, see [[Sling]]''.

The '''Slings''' skill governs how good your character is at firing stones and sling bullets using a [[hunting sling]] or [[fustibalus]]. It [[crosstrain]]s with the [[Throwing]] skill.
